__e: Speak out about romance and everything?
It means romance and adventure and, as I shall never have any...
They're all very nice, they promise the moon, but in the end, these assholes just think about their money.
F for friendship, she came seeking, you found a foe.
Well, I guess the romantic part doesn't matter much after you've been married as long as you and Daddy.
It's not always easy to ask for what you want, whether it's a little romance... or a little help or a little respect.
